General.Name: Shenzhen Techwinsemi Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Techwinsemi Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the integrated circuit design, research and development, and industrial application. It designs and develops flash memory main control chips; develops and optimizes storage module product application solutions; and sells storage module products. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
